page.title: 08TEENAGE LIFE - LITTLE WITLEY
page.content: {A WEEKEND. }On Friday I am always pleased to arrive home from college and relax by sitting on a comfortable chair and quietly watching television. I{play my trumpet}in the county Orchestra. So usually on a Saturday morning I attend the rehearsals and am fetched home at lunchtime. In the {afternoon}I take the family dog for a walk around the village, or spend time in the kitchen cooking. In the{evening I often go out with my friends to a night club or wine bar in the town. At the disco we dance, drink and chat and thoroughly enjoy ourselves. Each{Sunday}I attend the family service at church and at lunchtime a Sunday roast dinner is cooked.I spend the afternoon doing homework for college, in the evening I watch television and return to college on Monday. by Vanessa Ashley.
